name: Folklorico print on cream aline skirt by Wanderlust Clothing
description:
A Wanderlust favourite, the classic aline skirt in limited edition retro inspired prints! Featuring my signature stretchy waist band - comfort has never been so stylish.

A year round favourite, perfect for summer, or layer up with tights and boots in winter! 

100% woven light weight cotton designer print fabric panels and cotton lycra stretch waistband

Custom made to your size:

SIZING:

Base your purchase on your hip measurement (around widest part) :

Size XS -6/8:The skirt sits just on the knee and the main panels are 49 cm long with an additional 7cm wide waist band. 
Hip: 90 - 93cm

Size S -10 :The skirt sits just on the knee and the main panels are 51 cm long with an additional 7cm wide waist band. 
Hip: 96 - 99cm

Size M - 12:The skirt sits just above the knee and the main panels are 52 cm long with an additional 7cm wide waist band. 
Hip: 102 - 105cm

Size L - 14: The skirt sits just on the knee and the main panels are 54 cm long with an additional 7cm wide waist band. 
Hip: 108 - 112cm

Size XL - 16: The skirt sits just on the knee and the main panels are 54 cm long with an additional 7cm wide waist band. 
Hip: 115 - 119cm

Size 18: The skirt sits just on the knee and the main panels are 55 cm long with an additional 7cm wide waist band. 
Hip 121 - 124

Handmade with love!

Limited Edition Print

--------------------------------------------------------

Wanderlust - Definition:
wan.der.lust (w n d r-l st ). n. A very strong or irresistible impulse to travel 

The definition perfectly sums up the free spirited nature that has seen the Designer Trish Stenzel travel, live and work around the globe. Her love for travelling and the coastal lifestyle are the true source of inspiration behind the label and so aptly the name Wanderlust was chosen.


The Wanderlust Collection is currently handmade by the designer herself in Newcastle, NSW, Australia.

name: wanderlust drape cowl neck halter top red
description:
The drape neck halter top from Wanderlust by Miss Fancypants - the quickest way to update your wardrobe! Perfect for layering over camis, dresses, T-shirts and long sleeved tops in winter. You can tie the halter behind your neck or wear "up-side-down" and tied behind your waist - it's up to you! Also great for mums with bubs, looking for a little bit of extra stylish coverage whilst breast feeding.

SPECIAL $35 each RRP $59

One size fits most. WIll fit up to size Australian 14/16

Made from a super modal knit.

Available in a range of colours

--------------------------------------------------------

wan·der·lust (w n d r-l st ). n. A very strong or irresistible impulse to travel.Wanderlust is the brainchild of Trish Stenzel, the designer behind the successful Miss Fancypants pinup swimwear label.

Wanderlust is a retro infused Resort Collection that takes you from day to night, from beach to bar and beyond. Perfect for layering, dressing up or down, the collection is specifically designed with travel in mind.

The collection features timeless pieces made from travel friendly fabrics and many designs are multi functional, giving you many different looks from just the one garment.

The collection does not follow trends, rather, it is specifically designed to transcend seasons. Each carefully designed piece is aimed at becoming a well loved staple in your wardrobe and your travels for years to come.

Wanderlust - Definition: 
wan·der·lust (w n d r-l st ). n. A very strong or irresistible impulse to travel

The definition perfectly sums up the free spirited nature that has seen the Designer Trish Stenzel travel, live and work around the globe. Her love for travelling and the coastal lifestyle are the true source of inspiration behind the label and so aptly the name Wanderlust was chosen.

The Wanderlust Collection is currently handmade by the designer herself in Newcastle, Australia.

name: Drape neck halter top Yellow by Wanderlust Clothing
description:
The drape neck halter top - the quickest way to update your wardrobe! Perfect for layering over camis, dresses, T-shirts and long sleeved tops in winter. You can tie the halter behind your neck or wear "up-side-down" and tied behind your waist - it's up to you!

Made from super soft stretch knit fabric this top is perfect as maternity wear as adjusts with you as your belly grows as it ties behind your back. Perfect for layering over tops too! And for those looking for a bit of coverage whilst breast feeding - this top is ideal - untie behind your back and it works like a lovely big scarf around your neck!

One size fits most. Will fit up to size Australian 14/16

Made from a super soft viscose spandex knit.

Available in a range of colours

name: Alter Ego 2 way panel skirt cream green birds by Wanderlust Clothing
description:
Based on my best selling classic aline skirt design with signature stretchy waist band, the Alter Ego Skirt is made up of an apron panel that features a different print on the back and is half attached to one of the side seams. It can therefore be worn either way, giving you 2 completely different looks! 

Twist the back of the skirt to the front and flip the panel over, tie up on the side to feature the "back" print!

Genius or what?

Perfect for winter, layer up over leggings or tights and the perfect boot lenght too.

The panel is made from a premium linen cotton blend designer fabric. 
The aline skirt is made from a lovely mid weight stretch knit ponti fabric with fabulous drape.

wan·der·lust (w n d r-l st ). n. A very strong or irresistible impulse to travel.Wanderlust is the brainchild of Trish Stenzel, the designer behind the successful Miss Fancypants pinup swimwear label.

Wanderlust is a retro infused Resort Collection that takes you from day to night, from beach to bar and beyond. Perfect for layering, dressing up or down, the collection is specifically designed with travel in mind. 

The collection features timeless pieces made from travel friendly fabrics and many designs are multi functional, giving you many different looks from just the one garment. 

The collection does not follow trends, rather, it is specifically designed to transcend seasons. Each carefully designed piece is aimed at becoming a well loved staple in your wardrobe and your travels for years to come. 

Wanderlust - Definition:
wan·der·lust (w n d r-l st ). n. A very strong or irresistible impulse to travel
